aboutComponent.paragraphOne: Meet with Cem, a software engineer graduated from Maltepe University Software (50% Scholarship) (English) Department who is chilling with creating free open source applications for web & mobile platforms.
aboutComponent.paragraphTwo: Knows Java, Android(Java), Javascript, SQL, PL\SQL languages very well, worked with them in business life also. Done many projects up to this time and have used libraries as much. Knows somethings about many other languages.

shortContent.contentOne: Is one of the key feature for web development.
shortContent.contentTwo: Responsive websites work seamlessly across a variety of devices and screen sizes.
shortContent.contentThree: Plays a significant role in enhancing a site's search engine optimization (SEO).

shortContent.contentOne: Is a critical aspect of web development focused on protecting websites and web applications from various cyber threats.
shortContent.contentTwo: Web security knowledge is essential for creating robust and resilient web applications in an environment where cyber threats are constantly evolving.
